Class Background

  • java.lang.Object
    • Background

  • public class Background
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a background for the plane, containing scenery images and fires
    Version:
    5/22/19
    Author:
    Ashwini Suriyaprakash, Shreya Ganti

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Background()
      Creates an instance of a Background with scenery images, fires at random locations, and runways

      Scrolls the background to the left to make it look like the plane is moving until the last image

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Loads scenery images and sets up the background's fires
        Parameters:
        drawer - PApplet required for the setup

      • scrollBackgroundSideways

        public void scrollBackgroundSideways(double v)
        Scrolls the background to the left to make it look like the plane is moving until the last image
        Parameters:
        v - the velocity of scrolling

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws a Background object on a PApplet
        Parameters:
        drawer - PApplet on which the Background object is drawn
